data.title: Leon Lai keeps mum on possible premature birth of his baby girl
meta_keywords: Leon Lai keeps mum on possible premature birth of his baby girl
data.meta_description: Rumours have emerged Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai recently become a father after his assistant gave birth to a baby girl. However, his daughter may be arrived prematurely.
data.text:
Rumours circulated on Monday (April 23) that Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai, 51, and his assistant Wing Chan, 32, had recently – and quietly – welcomed a new baby. Apple Daily reported that the girl was born prematurely and weighed only 2.3kg.

Lai had confirmed the pregnancy in March 2018, and posted on Facebook that they were “two people who have experienced divorce” but had gotten together. He did not share if they were married but said he would protect his family against media exposure.
